data.title: TV Review — Knowing Me Knowing You with Alan Partridge
data.meta_description: British comedy series — you get in, you get out. I really do wish we had more than six episodes with this show, but if there’s any…
data.text:
British comedy series — you get in, you get out. I really do wish we had more than six episodes with this show, but if there’s any consolation, we have gotten plenty more (and some even better) Alan Partridge since then.

This is a fantastic show. I’ve never seen anything quite like this. It’s such compelling television, with a horrifically unprepared television host asking awkward questions to his guests and offending them, utilizing ill thought out segments to horrific effects. And just about everything that could go wrong in a chat show, does.

But Alan is the real showstealer here. He’s such a fully realized character, performed incredibly by Steve Coogan.

Every episode is great, and some are among the best half hours of comic television you’ll ever see.

Rating: 10/10
